Mark of Anathema.name: Mark of Anathema
Mark of Anathema.flavor: You place a mark of anathema on your foe, a shining brand that sears the flesh and harms those who ally with your enemy.
Mark of Anathema.onHit: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and ongoing 10 radiant damage (save ends).
Mark of Anathema.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 5 radiant damage (save ends).
Mark of Anathema.effect: Whenever the target fails a saving throw against the ongoing damage, each enemy within 5 squares of the target takes 5 radiant damage.

Fires of Judgment.name: Fires of Judgment
Fires of Judgment.flavor: After weighing your enemies’ corruption you deem them worthy only of hellfire and death.
Fires of Judgment.covenantOfWrath: You gain a +1 bonus to the attack roll if any bloodied allies are in the burst.
Fires of Judgment.onHit: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier fire damage. If you have any bloodied allies in the burst, the attack deals 2d12 + Wisdom modifier fire damage instead.
Fires of Judgment.covenantOfPreservation: Allies in the burst gain a +2 bonus to saving throws until the start of your next turn.

Avenging Light.name: Avenging Light
Avenging Light.flavor: You smite your foe with a searing orb of light, an orb that burns with the fire of vengeance if your allies have been harmed.
Avenging Light.onHit:
1d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage. If a bloodied ally is adjacent to the target, the attack deals extra radiant damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
Level 21: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage.
Avenging Light.special: You can use this power as a ranged basic attack.

Divine Bolts.name: Divine Bolts
Divine Bolts.flavor: You hurl bolts of divine lightning at your enemies.
Divine Bolts.onHit:
1d6 + Wisdom modifier lightning damage.
Level 21: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier lightning damage.

Vanguard's Lightning.name: Vanguard's Lightning
Vanguard's Lightning.flavor: Bolts of divine lightning arc from your hands to scorch the area before you. The bolts linger, ready to avenge any attacks made by your foes
Vanguard's Lightning.onHit:
1d6 + Wisdom modifier lightning damage. Whenever the target makes an opportunity attack before the end of your next turn, the target takes lightning damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.
Level 21: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier lightning damage.

Grasping Shards.name: Grasping Shards
Grasping Shards.flavor: You hurl a crystalline sphere of magic at your foes. On impact, it splinters into hundreds of tiny, radiant blades, which slice into your enemies and slow their movement.
Grasping Shards.onHit:
Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Level 21: 1d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage.

Thunder of Judgment.name: Thunder of Judgment
Thunder of Judgment.flavor: Blasts of thunder rock the air around your foes each time you strike your staff on the ground, leaving them battered and senseless.
Thunder of Judgment.onHit: 1d6 + Wisdom modifier thunder damage, or 2d6 + Wisdom modifier thunder damage if you target only one creature. In addition, the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Thunder of Judgment.covenantOfWrath: You also push the target a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier.

Spear of the Inquisitor.name: Spear of the Inquisitor
Spear of the Inquisitor.flavor: A lance of gleaming energy slices through the air and into your foe, burning it with the power of the gods and rooting it in place.
Spear of the Inquisitor.onHit: 1d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Angelic Echelon.name: Angelic Echelon
Angelic Echelon.flavor: Spectral angels swoop down to attack the foes around you and then linger briefly, threatening to inflict further damage.
Angelic Echelon.onHit: 1d6 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage. Whenever the target attacks before the end of your next turn, the target takes 5 radiant damage.

Anthem of the First Dawn.name: Anthem of the First Dawn
Anthem of the First Dawn.flavor: When the gods struck their final blow against those who would destroy the cosmos, the dawning of the first day brought death to their enemies and life to their surviving friends.
Anthem of the First Dawn.effect: Each ally in the burst can spend a healing surge.

Wall of Light.name: Wall of Light
Wall of Light.flavor: You transform divine energy into the form of a long, glowing wall.
Wall of Light.effect: You conjure a wall of divine energy. The wall is 1 square high, and it lasts until the end of your next turn. While within the wall, any ally gains a +1 power bonus to AC, and each ally who starts his or her turn in the wall gains 5 temporary hit points.

Divine Renewal.name: Divine Renewal
Divine Renewal.flavor: You fortify your allies with life-sustaining power.
Divine Renewal.target: One or two allies who each have two healing surges or fewer
Divine Renewal.effect: Each target regains a healing surge.

Shield of Light.name: Shield of Light
Shield of Light.flavor: A flash of light flares in your enemy’s eyes, disrupting its attack against your ally.
Shield of Light.trigger: An enemy within 10 squares of you makes an attack roll against your ally
Shield of Light.effect: The target takes a -3 penalty to the triggering attack roll. If the attack hits and deals damage, you slide the ally 1 square after the damage is dealt.

Divine Call.name: Divine Call
Divine Call.flavor: You intone a word of power to rally your allies to your side.

Emissary of the Gods.name: Emissary of the Gods
Emissary of the Gods.flavor: You speak with the voice of the gods, compelling others to heed your words.
Emissary of the Gods.effect: You gain a +5 power bonus to your next Diplomacy check or Intimidate check during this encounter. If you make this check as part of a skill challenge, you gain 2 successes if the check is successful and don't gain a failure if the check fails.

Offering of Justice.name: Offering of Justice
Offering of Justice.flavor: You call out to the gods, demanding retribution against a foe who dares to strike at you or your allies and mercy for a foe who refrains from attacking.
Offering of Justice.effect: If the target attacks you or your allies before the end of its next turn, the target takes 2d10 + your Wisdom modifier radiant damage at the end of that turn. If the target doesn't attack you or your allies before the end of its next turn, the target instead gains 5 temporary hit points at the end of that turn.

Glyph of Imprisonment.name: Glyph of Imprisonment
Glyph of Imprisonment.flavor: A divine glyph of censure forms around your foes, searing them and glowing with radiant power. If they move from their positions, the glyph flares with searing light.
Glyph of Imprisonment.onHit: 1d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage. If the target moves before the end of its next turn, the target takes 5 radiant damage.

Sun Hammer.name: Sun Hammer
Sun Hammer.flavor: Forged from the light of the Bright City of Hestavar, the sun hammer glows brighter the more your allies suffer. You invoke the hammer to call down a radiant burst upon your foes.
Sun Hammer.onHit: 1d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage. If any bloodied allies are in the burst, the attack deals 2 extra radiant damage.

Vindicating Flames.name: Vindicating Flames
Vindicating Flames.flavor: A barrage of fiery orbs fills an area with lingering flames, which surround your foes.
Vindicating Flames.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier fire damage, and if the target moves before the end of your next turn, it takes 10 fire damage.
Vindicating Flames.covenantOfWrath: If the target moves before the end of your next turn, the fire damage equals 10 + your Constitution modifier.

Invoke Obedience.name: Invoke Obedience
Invoke Obedience.flavor: As you are filled with glory, your enemies know they must either bow before you or suffer your wrath.
Invoke Obedience.effect: Before the attack, each target can fall prone as a free action. The attack automatically misses a prone target.
Invoke Obedience.covenantOfWrath: Each prone target takes 1d6 psychic damage.

Bolt of the Rising Sun.name: Bolt of the Rising Sun
Bolt of the Rising Sun.flavor: A soft ray of light dances across your foe. The light increases in radiance until it chars the foe’s flesh and impairs its vision.
Bolt of the Rising Sun.onHit: 1d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target doesn’t have line of sight to any creature more than 3 squares away from it.

Thunderbolt of the Heavens.name: Thunderbolt of the Heavens
Thunderbolt of the Heavens.flavor: A crackling bolt of blue energy leaps from your staff, knocking your enemies away from you.
Thunderbolt of the Heavens.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier thunder damage, and you push the target 1 square.
Thunderbolt of the Heavens.covenantOfPreservation: The number of squares you push the target equals 1 + your Intelligence modifier.

Baleful Eye of Judgment.name: Baleful Eye of Judgment
Baleful Eye of Judgment.flavor: You fix your wrathful glare upon a group of enemies, filling them with awe and terror.
Baleful Eye of Judgment.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

Icon of Terror.name: Icon of Terror
Icon of Terror.flavor: You invoke the Icon of Terror, an image that was once used to drive the beings of the Far Realm from this reality. You drive nearby creatures back in fear as the icon assaults their minds.
Icon of Terror.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage, and you push the target 2 squares.
Icon of Terror.covenantOfWrath: The number of squares you push the target equals your Constitution modifier.
Icon of Terror.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square.

Grasping Chains of the Justiciar.name: Grasping Chains of the Justiciar
Grasping Chains of the Justiciar.flavor: You invoke the chains of Rathos, an exarch of the gods charged with capturing renegade angels. These glowing blue chains erupt from the ground to tether your foes in place.
Grasping Chains of the Justiciar.onHit: 1d6 + Wisdom modifier force damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).
Grasping Chains of the Justiciar.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Purging Flame.name: Purging Flame
Purging Flame.flavor: Divine fire washes over your foe, burning not only its physical form but the very stuff of its soul.
Purging Flame.onHit: 1d10 + Wisdom modifier fire damage, and ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends).
Purging Flame.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).

Visions of Paradise.name: Visions of Paradise
Visions of Paradise.flavor: You speak the seven words of peace, sending your foe into a dreamlike state as visions of paradise cloud its mind.
Visions of Paradise.onHit: The target is unable to make attacks (save ends). Whenever the target is attacked, it can make a saving throw against this effect.
Visions of Paradise.onMiss: The target is unable to make attacks until the end of its next turn. If the target is attacked before the end of its next turn, this effect ends.

Searing Orb.name: Searing Orb
Searing Orb.flavor: A miniature sun appears amid your foes, blinding them with divine radiance.
Searing Orb.onHit: 1d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and the target is blinded (save ends).
Searing Orb.covenantOfPreservation: The target is also dazed until the end of your next turn.
Searing Orb.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.

Fourfold Invocation of Doom.name: Fourfold Invocation of Doom
Fourfold Invocation of Doom.flavor: As you speak the four verses of doom, your foes wilt in fear, their enthusiasm for the battle doused.
Fourfold Invocation of Doom.onMiss: The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Fourfold Invocation of Doom.effect: Until the end of the encounter, any creature that hits or misses you takes 5 psychic damage.

Summon Blade Angel.name: Summon Blade Angel
Summon Blade Angel.flavor: You trace a shimmering sigil in the air, and an angelic figure steps from it, bearing the twin swords of vengeance and pain.
Summon Blade Angel.effect: You summon a Medium blade angel in an unoccupied square within range. The angel has speed 6 and fly 6 (hover). It has a +4 bonus to AC. You can give the angel the following special commands.
Summon Blade Angel.minorAction: Melee 1; targets one creature; Wisdom vs. Fortitude; 1d8 + Wisdom modifier damage.
Summon Blade Angel.opportunityAttack: Melee 1; targets one creature; Wisdom vs. Reflex; 1d8 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is slowed until the end of its turn.

Invoke Angelic Form.name: Invoke Angelic Form
Invoke Angelic Form.flavor: Your ally partially transforms into an angel and can now fly on divine wings.
Invoke Angelic Form.effect: Until the end of the encounter, the target gains a fly speed of 8 and can hover.

Astral Step.name: Astral Step
Astral Step.flavor: You create momentary doorways through the Astral Sea, teleporting yourself and your companions a short distance.
Astral Step.target: You and each ally in the burst
Astral Step.covenantOfPreservation: The number of squares you teleport each target equals 3 + your Intelligence modifier.

Demand Justice.name: Demand Justice
Demand Justice.flavor: Whether an ally labors under a deadly effect or a foe seeks to escape the just end wrought by your magic, you tilt fate in your favor.
Demand Justice.trigger: A creature within 10 squares of you makes a saving throw
Demand Justice.effect: The target rerolls the saving throw and must use the new result.

Symbol of Hope.name: Symbol of Hope
Symbol of Hope.flavor: You conjure a glowing symbol of hope, which renews your allies’ efforts against the enemy
Symbol of Hope.effect: You conjure a symbol of hope in an unoccupied square within range. The symbol lasts until the end of your next turn. Any ally within 5 squares of the symbol gains a +2 power bonus to saving throws, and any ally who starts his or her turn within 5 squares of the symbol gains 5 temporary hit points.

Angelic Visage.name: Angelic Visage
Angelic Visage.flavor: As your foe attacks, you transform into the image of a death angel. Filled with terror, the foe backs away.
Angelic Visage.trigger: An enemy within 5 squares of you makes an attack roll against you
Angelic Visage.effect: The target takes a -2 penalty to the triggering attack roll. After the attack is resolved, you push the target 3 squares.

Winds of Celestia.name: Winds of Celestia
Winds of Celestia.flavor: You call the winds that buffet the upper reaches of Celestia to scatter your foes.
Winds of Celestia.onHit: 3d6 + Wisdom modifier damage, and you either slide the target 2 squares or knock it prone.
Winds of Celestia.covenantOfPreservation: Either the number of squares you slide the target equals 1 + your Intelligence modifier, or you slide the target 1 square before knocking it prone.

Pillar of Guardian Flame.name: Pillar of Guardian Flame
Pillar of Guardian Flame.flavor: You whisper a divine word that rumbles like distant thunder as a pillar of flame erupts around your enemies.
Pillar of Guardian Flame.effect: The burst creates a zone of divine fire that lasts until the end of your next turn. When any enemy within the zone leaves it or hits or misses you or your allies outside it, that enemy takes 5 fire damage.

Compel Attention.name: Compel Attention
Compel Attention.flavor: You speak with the voice of divine authority, forcing an enemy to pause.
Compel Attention.onHit: 3d8 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Compel Attention.effect: You gain a +5 bonus to Diplomacy checks and Intimidate checks against the target until the end of your next turn.

Seal of the Heretic.name: Seal of the Heretic
Seal of the Heretic.flavor: You mark your foes with a divine brand, bringing the wrathful eyes of the gods upon them.
Seal of the Heretic.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage, or 3d8 + Wisdom modifier damage if you target only one creature. The target takes a -5 penalty to a saving throw of your choice before the end of your next turn.
Seal of the Heretic.covenantOfWrath: The target takes the -5 penalty to all saving throws before the end of your next turn.

Offering of Peace.name: Offering of Peace
Offering of Peace.flavor: You invoke the word of the gods, offering a foe a moment of respite. If either your foe or your allies break this bond, the gods impose their judgment.
Offering of Peace.effect: If the target attacks before the end of your next turn, it takes 4d10 + your Wisdom modifier radiant damage. If you or an ally attacks the target before the end of your next turn, the target gains 10 temporary hit points and a +5 bonus to its next attack roll.
Offering of Peace.covenantOfPreservation: You and your allies gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

Glyph of Three Blades.name: Glyph of Three Blades
Glyph of Three Blades.flavor: In ages past, the gods forged three sacred blades that could surround and trap the mightiest primordials. You invoke these weapons to trap your foes in a ring of spectral blades.
Glyph of Three Blades.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage. If the target moves more than 1 square before the end of your next turn, the target takes 5 damage.
Glyph of Three Blades.covenantOfPreservation: The damage the target takes from moving more than 1 square equals 5 + your Intelligence modifier.

Blood Debt.name: Blood Debt
Blood Debt.flavor: Each wound your foe deals adds to its mounting debt of blood and invites your allies’ retribution.
Blood Debt.onHit: 3d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage. Until the end of your next turn, each creature that the target attacks gains a +2 bonus to its next attack roll against the target.
Blood Debt.covenantOfWrath: The bonus to the attack roll equals 1 + your Constitution modifier.

Curse of Haemnathuun.name: Curse of Haemnathuun
Curse of Haemnathuun.flavor: You invoke a faint echo of the curse that transformed the fearsome primordial Haemnathuun into a statue, partially encasing your foes in stone for a moment.
Curse of Haemnathuun.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is dazed and immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Invoke Terror.name: Invoke Terror
Invoke Terror.flavor: You invoke the words of fear that the gods once cast at the primordials to drive them into the prisons that hold them to this day.
Invoke Terror.onHit: 3d8 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage, and the target moves half its speed away from you, avoiding unsafe squares and difficult terrain if it can.
Invoke Terror.covenantOfWrath: Until the start of your next turn, opportunity attacks that hit the target deal extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Word of Rebuke.name: Word of Rebuke
Word of Rebuke.flavor: You speak a word of divine rebuke, disrupting your foe’s mind and hindering its attacks.
Word of Rebuke.onHit: 5d6 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Word of Rebuke.covenantOfPreservation: Until the end of your next turn, the target also takes a penalty to attack rolls equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Glyph of Radiance.name: Glyph of Radiance
Glyph of Radiance.flavor: You invoke a glyph of radiance, a tool used by the gods both to illuminate the darkest realms and to blind their enemies with the glyph’s unyielding light.
Glyph of Radiance.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.

Word of Annihilation.name: Word of Annihilation
Word of Annihilation.flavor: You whisper a word of annihilation, threatening your enemies with oblivion.

Cascade of Five Suns.name: Cascade of Five Suns
Cascade of Five Suns.flavor: You invoke the power of the five suns—a group of stars the gods used to navigate the Astral Sea when the primordials threatened to extinguish all light—to sear your enemies with radiant energy.
Cascade of Five Suns.attack: Wisdom vs. Reflex. Make a number of attack rolls equal to the number of targets, and then assign each roll to a target.

Storm of Celestia.name: Storm of Celestia
Storm of Celestia.flavor: You invoke the storms that sometimes rumble over Celestia’s slopes, using their winds and thunder to scatter the enemy.
Storm of Celestia.onHit: 5d6 + Wisdom modifier thunder damage, and you slide the target to any unoccupied space in the burst.

Summon Angel of Fire.name: Summon Angel of Fire
Summon Angel of Fire.flavor: A mote of light appears before you, and from it steps an angelic figure wreathed in fire.
Summon Angel of Fire.effect: You summon a Medium angel of fire in an unoccupied square within range. The angel has speed 6 and fly 6 (hover). You can give the angel the following special commands.
Summon Angel of Fire.standardAction: Close burst 1; targets each creature in the burst; Wisdom vs. Reflex; 1d8 + Wisdom modifier fire damage.
Summon Angel of Fire.opportunityAttack: Melee 1; targets one creature; Wisdom vs. Reflex; 1d8 + Wisdom modifier fire damage.

Cerulean Flames.name: Cerulean Flames
Cerulean Flames.flavor: Ancient texts speak of the Cerulean Sign, a powerful sigil used to hold creatures from beyond the cosmos at bay. You invoke this sign, creating a pool of radiance that blinds those that leave its grasp.
Cerulean Flames.effect: The burst creates a zone of cerulean light that lasts until the end of your next turn. Any creature that starts its turn within the zone and leaves it is blinded (save ends).

Tomb of Magrym.name: Tomb of Magrym
Tomb of Magrym.flavor: You invoke the name of Magrym—an exarch of stone and darkness who helped build the prison Carceri—to entomb your foes.
Tomb of Magrym.effect:
The burst conjures a tomb of white stone. The tomb fills the burst and must be on a solid surface. The tomb is a solid obstacle, and it can be attacked as an object: AC 6, Fortitude 10, Reflex 5, and 60 hit points. When the tomb is destroyed, it crumbles into difficult terrain.
    As the tomb appears, make the following attack.
Tomb of Magrym.onHit: 3d6 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target disappears into the tomb. While inside the tomb, the target is dazed and doesn’t have line of sight or line of effect to anything other than the tomb. The target can make melee and close attacks only against the tomb. When the tomb is destroyed, the target reappears in the space it last occupied or in the nearest unoccupied space.
Tomb of Magrym.onMiss: Half damage, and you slide the target to the nearest space outside the burst.

Fires of the Silver Gate.name: Fires of the Silver Gate
Fires of the Silver Gate.flavor: You invoke the power of the Silver Gate, a prison that holds a primordial whose name is long forgotten. The gate’s radiance pours forth, consuming your foe and marking it as anathema. Only a fool lingers near it as you consign its soul to the gods.
Fires of the Silver Gate.effect: The target takes ongoing 10 radiant damage (save ends). Until the target saves against this ongoing damage, any enemy takes 10 radiant damage when it ends its turn within 5 squares of the target.

Invoke the Absolute Dark.name: Invoke the Absolute Dark
Invoke the Absolute Dark.flavor: A sphere of absolute darkness appears amid your foes as you create a gate to the dead space between the planes. The sphere rips at your foes as it draws them near.
Invoke the Absolute Dark.effect: The burst creates a zone of darkness that lasts until the end of your next turn. The zone is totally obscured. In addition, any creature that starts its turn within the zone takes 10 damage, slides 1 square toward the zone’s center, and is slowed until the end of its turn. You can dismiss the zone as a minor action.
Invoke the Absolute Dark.sustainMinor: The zone persists, and you can increase its size by 1 to a maximum of burst 5.

Summon Angel of Light.name: Summon Angel of Light
Summon Angel of Light.flavor: A mote of light appears before you, and an angel clad in glowing silver armor steps forth from it. The angel wields a flail that ends in an orb of pure radiance.
Summon Angel of Light.effect: You summon a Medium angel of light in an unoccupied square within range. The angel has speed 6 and fly 8 (hover). It has a +4 bonus to AC and a +2 bonus to its other defenses. Any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to the angel is marked by the angel until the end of your next turn. You can give the angel the following special commands.
Summon Angel of Light.minorAction: Melee 1; targets one creature; Wisdom vs. Reflex; 1d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and until the end of your next turn, the target doesn’t have line of sight to creatures more than 5 squares away from it.
Summon Angel of Light.opportunityAttack: Melee 1; targets one creature; Wisdom vs. Reflex; 1d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage.

Summon Angel of Victory.name: Summon Angel of Victory
Summon Angel of Victory.flavor: With a great shout, you call to the gods for aid against your foes. An angel of victory, a member of the angelic host that defeated the primordials, answers your call.
Summon Angel of Victory.effect: You summon a Medium angel of victory in an unoccupied square within range. The angel has speed 6 and fly 8 (hover). It has a +4 bonus to AC and a +2 bonus to its other defenses. You can give the angel the following special commands.
Summon Angel of Victory.minorAction: Melee 1; targets one creature; Wisdom vs. Will; 2d10 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to all defenses until the end of your next turn.
Summon Angel of Victory.standardAction: Close burst 2; targets each enemy in the burst; Wisdom vs. Reflex; the angel pulls the target 1 square, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Summon Angel of Victory.opportunityAttack: Melee 1; targets one creature; Wisdom vs. Will; 2d10 + Wisdom modifier damage.

Word of the Gods.name: Word of the Gods
Word of the Gods.flavor: Speaking with the authority of the gods, you utter a word of command. Those who hear it must obey or suffer.

Wall of Blades.name: Wall of Blades
Wall of Blades.flavor: You draw shards of astral steel into the world and arrange them into a deadly wall of spinning blades. You then command parts of the wall to fly at your enemies.

bonusPower.name: Wall of Blades Attack
bonusPower.flavor: You draw shards of astral steel into the world and arrange them into a deadly wall of spinning blades. You then command parts of the wall to fly at your enemies.
bonusPower.requirement: The Wall of Blades power must be active to use this power.
bonusPower.effect: Before the attack, remove a square of the wall.

Wall of Blades.effect:
You conjure a wall in unoccupied squares that consists of radiant blades. The wall can be up to 4 squares high, and it lasts until the end of your next turn. The wall provides cover to you and your allies. Any creature that enters the wall or starts its turn there takes 2d10 + your Wisdom modifier radiant damage. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.
    While you are within 5 squares of the wall, you can use the Wall of Blades Attack power.

Racking Invocation of Pain.name: Racking Invocation of Pain
Racking Invocation of Pain.flavor: You invoke the divine word of pain to send agony coursing through your enemies. The slightest touch causes them to double over in pain.
Racking Invocation of Pain.onHit: 4d8 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is dazed and takes 10 extra damage whenever it is hit by a melee attack (save ends both).
Racking Invocation of Pain.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).

Three Beacons of Twilight.name: Three Beacons of Twilight
Three Beacons of Twilight.flavor: In the darkest days of the war against the primordials, the gods used three gleaming beacons to guide them across the Astral Sea. Today, those lights still burn, misleading your enemies while guiding your allies to safety.
Three Beacons of Twilight.effect: The burst creates a zone of glimmering light that lasts until the end of the encounter. As a minor action, you can teleport a creature within the zone 5 squares.

God Hammer.name: God Hammer
God Hammer.flavor: A gleaming, spectral warhammer appears above your foes and slams down in their midst, creating a crash of thunder. The hammer is an image of Guldarak, which the gods shaped out of pure thunder to drive primordials out of the earth’s depths.
God Hammer.effect: Each target drops prone. In addition, the burst creates a zone of resounding thunder that lasts until the end of your next turn. At the start of your next turn, any creature within the zone drops prone.

Rain of Colorless Fire.name: Rain of Colorless Fire
Rain of Colorless Fire.flavor: Ancient legends tell of fire without color that fell from the sky for a year to annihilate a nation of wizards who sought to overthrow the gods.
Rain of Colorless Fire.effect: The burst creates a zone of colorless fire that lasts until the end of your next turn. At the start of your turn, each creature within the zone takes 3d10 + your Wisdom modifier fire damage.

Invoke the Fallen.name: Invoke the Fallen
Invoke the Fallen.flavor: In their final battles, the gods used their fallen as terrible weapons. The ashes of dead gods choked, blinded, and killed  their enemies. You invoke these remains and turn them against your foes.
Invoke the Fallen.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target takes ongoing 10 damage and is blinded (save ends both).
Invoke the Fallen.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.
Invoke the Fallen.effect: The burst creates a zone of lightly obscured terrain until the end of the encounter. While within the zone, you and your allies gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls with divine powers.

Malediction of Gartak.name: Malediction of Gartak
Malediction of Gartak.flavor: The exarch Gartak betrayed the gods. He was cursed so that the next killing blow he landed on a foe caused him to die with the same wound.
Malediction of Gartak.effect: Whenever the target hits with an attack, the target takes 10 damage. This effect ends at the end of the target’s turn if it has not attacked since the end of its last turn.

Astral Tempest.name: Astral Tempest
Astral Tempest.flavor: You breach the wall between this world and an astral dominion, causing a storm of divine energy to rip through your foes, scattering them, before it dissipates.
Astral Tempest.onHit: 7d6 + Wisdom modifier damage, and you slide the target 5 squares and knock it prone.
Astral Tempest.onMiss: Half damage, and you slide the target 3 squares and knock it prone.

Shared Endurance.name: Shared Endurance
Shared Endurance.flavor: During the ancient war, the gods stood as one against their primordial foes. Your magic can help you and your allies stand as one as well, taking wounds on one another’s behalf.
Shared Endurance.trigger: An ally within 10 squares of you takes damage from an attack
Shared Endurance.effect: You or an ally within 10 squares of you takes the damage from the triggering attack instead of the target, but the target takes any other effect caused by the attack.

Walk Between Worlds.name: Walk Between Worlds
Walk Between Worlds.flavor: The gods built many strange passages through time and space to help them in their battles against the primordials. You know of many such paths.
Walk Between Worlds.effect: The target gains phasing until the end of your next turn.

Icon of Life.name: Icon of Life
Icon of Life.flavor: You invoke the symbol of life, a gleaming icon of gold that pulls your allies’ spirits back to their mortal shells, even as death tries to draw them away.
Icon of Life.effect: The burst creates a zone of golden light that lasts until the end of the encounter. While within the zone, any ally gains a +5 bonus to death saving throws, and if the ally rolls a natural 20 on a death saving throw, that ally can spend two healing surges rather than one.

Covenant of Endurance.name: Covenant of Endurance
Covenant of Endurance.flavor: You offer your life energy on your friends’ behalf.
Covenant of Endurance.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever an ally within 10 squares of you has an opportunity to spend a healing surge, you can spend a healing surge on that ally’s behalf as a free action. You spend the healing surge but regain no hit points, and the ally regains hit points as if he or she had spent a healing surge.

Covenant of Vengeance.name: Covenant of Vengeance
Covenant of Vengeance.flavor: You forge a covenant with your ally. Anyone foolish enough to attack that ally will suffer your wrath.
Covenant of Vengeance.target: You or one ally in the burst
Covenant of Vengeance.effect: All of the target’s marks end. Until the end of the encounter or until the target marks a creature, if a creature attacks the target, you and your allies gain a +4 power bonus to attack rolls against that creature until the end of your next turn.

Covenant of Life.name: Covenant of Life
Covenant of Life.flavor: You create a divine pact with one of your allies, offering your strength, and the strength of your friends, if your ally needs it.
Covenant of Life.target: You or one ally in the burst
Covenant of Life.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you and your allies can use second wind either to gain the normal benefits or to grant the benefits to the target. A donor character uses his or her second wind but neither regains hit points nor gains a bonus to all defenses, and the target regains hit points as if he or she had spent a healing surge and gains a +2 bonus to all defenses until the start of the donor’s next turn.

Invoke Heroism.name: Invoke Heroism
Invoke Heroism.flavor: The greatest heroes of the gods fought with the fury of two. You grant an ally such might.
Invoke Heroism.effect: The target can take an extra standard action during his or her next turn.

Shield of Justice.name: Shield of Justice
Shield of Justice.flavor: You invoke the justice of the gods, shielding your ally while calling doom upon your foe.
Shield of Justice.trigger: An enemy within 10 squares of you makes an attack roll against your ally
Shield of Justice.effect: The target takes a -4 penalty to the triggering attack roll. Until the end of your next turn, any attacker gains a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against the target.

Shroud of Warning.name: Shroud of Warning
Shroud of Warning.flavor: You invoke the gods' protection, allowing you and your allies to act a moment sooner when combat erupts.
Shroud of Warning.trigger: You and your allies roll initiative at the beginning of an encounter
Shroud of Warning.target: You and each ally in the burst
Shroud of Warning.effect: Each target gains a bonus to the initiative check equal to 2 + your Intelligence modifier.

Sun Strike.name: Sun Strike
Sun Strike.flavor: A beam of radiant energy extends from your hands to bathe a foe in searing light and force it to move.
Sun Strike.onHit:
1d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and you slide the target 1 square.
Level 21: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage.
Sun Strike.special: You can use this power as a ranged basic attack.

Rebuke Undead.name: Rebuke Undead
Rebuke Undead.flavor: Undead flee and then cower in your presence, their bodies seared by divine light.
Rebuke Undead.channelDivinity: You can use only one channel divinity power per encounter.
Rebuke Undead.target: Each undead creature in the blast
Rebuke Undead.onHit:
1d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage. You push the target 2 squares, and it is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Level 5: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage.
Level 11: 3d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage.
Level 15: 4d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage.
Level 21: 5d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage.
Level 25: 6d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage.

Astral Terror.name: Astral Terror
Astral Terror.flavor: Astral energy surges through you, transforming you into a beacon of divine terror that sends your foes reeling.
Astral Terror.onHit: 1d6 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage, and you push the target 2 squares.

Blades of Astral Fire.name: Blades of Astral Fire
Blades of Astral Fire.flavor: Gleaming blades of radiant energy appear and strike your foes. The blades then transform into spectral shields that protect your allies.
Blades of Astral Fire.effect: Each ally in the burst gains a +2 power bonus to AC until the end of your next turn.
Blades of Astral Fire.covenantOfPreservation: The bonus to AC equals 1 + your Intelligence modifier.

Binding Invocation of Chains.name: Binding Invocation of Chains
Binding Invocation of Chains.flavor: You whisper ancient words of binding, invoking the power of the gods to hinder your foes' movement with spectral chains.
Binding Invocation of Chains.onMiss: The target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Shroud of Awe.name: Shroud of Awe
Shroud of Awe.flavor: Your voice resonates with thunder, and you are shrouded in divine majesty that strikes awe and respect in your listeners' hearts.
Shroud of Awe.effect: You can speak with a thunderous voice that allows creatures within 500 feet of you to hear you clearly. Before the end of your turn, you gain a power bonus to your next Intimidate check equal to your Constitution modifier.

Chains of Carceri.name: Chains of Carceri
Chains of Carceri.flavor: You invoke the power of the prison of Carceri, causing red chains to appear around your enemies to hinder their movement.
Chains of Carceri.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Blade of Vengeance.name: Blade of Vengeance
Blade of Vengeance.flavor: A spectral form like a shining angel appears amid your foes. Though the angel is indistinct and incorporeal, its curving blade seems solid and poised to attack an enemy that threatens your  allies.
Blade of Vengeance.effect: Before the attack, you move the blade to a square adjacent to the triggering enemy.
Blade of Vengeance.sustainMinor: The blade persists, and you can move it 5 squares.
Blade of Vengeance.requirement: The Blade of Vengeance power must be active to use this power.
Blade of Vengeance.trigger: An enemy within 10 squares of the blade hits your ally

Martyr's Ward.name: Martyr's Ward
Martyr's Ward.flavor: You unleash a shield of divine energy that deflects an attack from your friend to yourself.
Martyr's Ward.trigger: An ally within 10 squares of you is hit by an area or a close attack
Martyr's Ward.effect: The triggering attack hits you instead of the ally.

Swarm of Astral Steel.name: Swarm of Astral Steel
Swarm of Astral Steel.flavor: You call on the gods to send a swarm of astral blades to attack your foes. The blades follow your command, slicing at enemies that advance or forcing them to disperse.
Swarm of Astral Steel.effect: The burst creates a zone of blades that lasts until the end of your next turn. Choose the zone’s effect: Each target hit by the attack either takes 10 damage if it ends its next turn within the zone or takes 10 damage if it ends its next turn outside the zone.

Ward of Divine Light.name: Ward of Divine Light
Ward of Divine Light.flavor: You shroud yourself in a column of blinding light that sustains your life and shields you from harm.
Ward of Divine Light.effect: You can spend two healing surges, and you are immune to all damage until the start of your next turn. If you willingly attack before the end of your next turn, you take damage equal to your bloodied value.

Maledictor's Doom.name: Maledictor's Doom
Maledictor's Doom.flavor: Foes who hear your solemn vow are shaken by its weighty promise.
Maledictor's Doom.channelDivinity: You can use only one channel divinity power per encounter
Maledictor's Doom.effect: Each target takes a -1 penalty to attack rolls and saving throws until the end of your next turn. In addition, whenever the target is hit by a fear attack before the end of your next turn, you push the target 1 square as a free action.

Hand of Radiance.name: Hand of Radiance
Hand of Radiance.flavor: Tendrils of radiance streak from your fingertips across the battlefield. The beams strike your enemies, raining sparks of light on impact.
Hand of Radiance.target:
One, two, or three creatures
Level 21: Target an additional creature.

Mantle of the Infidel.name: Mantle of the Infidel
Mantle of the Infidel.flavor: Holding your implement high, you conjure a radiant mantle that sears a foe and marks it as an enemy of the faith.
Mantle of the Infidel.onHit:
1d6 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage. If the target is marked, the penalty to attack rolls it takes from the marked condition is -4 instead of -2.
Level 21: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage.

Visions of Blood.name: Visions of Blood
Visions of Blood.flavor: The images of carnage and death that you invoke sow doubt in your enemies.
Visions of Blood.onHit:
1d6 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage, and the target takes a -1 penalty to all defenses until the start of your next turn.
Level 21: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage.

Forceful Denunciation.name: Forceful Denunciation
Forceful Denunciation.flavor: It is as if your god brushes aside your foes, such is the forcefulness of your denunciation.
Forceful Denunciation.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier thunder damage, and you push the target 1 square.
Forceful Denunciation.covenantOfPreservation: The number of squares you push the target equals your Intelligence modifier.

Lightning's Revelation.name: Lightning's Revelation
Lightning's Revelation.flavor: Lightning splits the air, striking your foes and exposing their frailty.
Lightning's Revelation.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier lightning damage, and the target takes a -1 penalty to all defenses until the end of your next turn.
Lightning's Revelation.covenantOfWrath: The penalty to all defenses equals your Constitution modifier.

Summons of Justice.name: Summons of Justice
Summons of Justice.flavor: Justice will be served no matter the cost. You draw from your own vitality to hurl a brilliant ray that compels your enemies to come forward.
Summons of Justice.target: One or two creatures in the burst
Summons of Justice.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modiier radiant damage, and you pull the target 3 squares.
Summons of Justice.covenantOfMalediction: You also knock the target prone.
Summons of Justice.effect: You are dazed until the end of your next turn.

Whispers of Defeat.name: Whispers of Defeat
Whispers of Defeat.flavor: Your words assume a life of their own, worming into your enemies’ minds and creating a feeling that defeat is inevitable.
Whispers of Defeat.onHit: Until the end of your next turn, the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls, and whenever the target misses with an attack, it takes 5 psychic damage.
Whispers of Defeat.covenantOfMalediction: Add your Wisdom modifier to the psychic damage.

Crown of Retaliation.name: Crown of Retaliation
Crown of Retaliation.flavor: You point at a foe and form a circle with your hands. A translucent crown then appears over that foe’s head, searing it with each injury your companions suffer.
Crown of Retaliation.effect: The target is affected by your crown of retaliation (save ends). Until the crown ends, the target takes 5 radiant damage when any ally within 5 squares of it takes damage.

Execration.name: Execration
Execration.flavor: You spit a dread curse, which punishes your enemies and causes you to feel an echo of their pain.
Execration.target: One or two creatures in the burst
Execration.onHit: 1d8 + Wisdom modifier damage, or 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage if you target only one creature. The target takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends).
Execration.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 5 damage (save ends).

Invocation of Ice and Fire.name: Invocation of Ice and Fire
Invocation of Ice and Fire.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier cold and fire damage.
Invocation of Ice and Fire.effect: The blast creates a zone of flaming hail that lasts until the end of your next turn. Any creature that starts its turn within the zone takes 5 cold and fire damage.

Silent Malediction.name: Silent Malediction
Silent Malediction.flavor: You enter a trance as your lips move. Your enemies don’t hear what you’re saying because of the thunder rumbling around them.
Silent Malediction.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier thunder damage, and the target is stunned (save ends).
Silent Malediction.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Silent Malediction.effect: You are dazed until the end of your next turn.

Storm Call.name: Storm Call
Storm Call.flavor: Filled with the wrath of the gods, you call down thunder and lightning on your enemy.
Storm Call.onHit: 1d8 + Wisdom modifier thunder damage. The target takes ongoing 5 lightning damage and is dazed (save ends both).
Storm Call.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).

Divine Protection.name: Divine Protection
Divine Protection.flavor: You act knowing that your god will save you from harm.
Divine Protection.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you don’t provoke opportunity attacks.

Encouraging Chant.name: Encouraging Chant
Encouraging Chant.flavor: You shout a word of hope to restore your allies’ confidence.
Encouraging Chant.effect: The burst creates a zone of hope that lasts until the end of your next turn. While within the zone, you and any allies gain a power bonus to saving throws equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Know Weakness.name: Know Weakness
Know Weakness.flavor: You utter words of power that are also words of knowledge.
Know Weakness.effect: Choose a creature within 10 squares of you. You know that creature’s current resistances and vulnerabilities, if any.

Lore of Shom.name: Lore of Shom
Lore of Shom.flavor: You invoke the vast knowledge of the lost civilization of Shom, gaining access to esoteric lore that might otherwise escape you.
Lore of Shom.trigger: You make an Arcana check, a History check, or a Religion check and dislike the result
Lore of Shom.effect: You reroll the skill check with a power bonus equal to your Intelligence modifier and use either result.

Miraculous Fortune.name: Miraculous Fortune
Miraculous Fortune.flavor: Though the attack strikes you, your timely prayer reduces the worst of the injury and inspires a nearby ally.
Miraculous Fortune.trigger: You are damaged by an enemy’s attack
Miraculous Fortune.effect: The damage is reduced by 5. One ally within 5 squares of you gains a +1 power bonus to attack rolls until the start of your next turn.

Knives of the Soul.name: Knives of the Soul
Knives of the Soul.flavor: Two translucent blades burst out of your body and streak toward your enemies. You stagger from the unleashed power.
Knives of the Soul.onHit: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier force damage, or 2d12 + Wisdom modifier force damage if you target only one creature. You push the target 1 square.
Knives of the Soul.covenantOfMalediction: The number of squares you push the target equals your Constitution modifier.

Penance Compelled.name: Penance Compelled
Penance Compelled.flavor: Someone will pay for these crimes; you guarantee it.
Penance Compelled.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage. The next time the target deals damage before the end of your next turn, choose another enemy within 10 squares of you. That enemy takes 5 radiant damage.
Penance Compelled.covenantOfWrath: The radiant damage that the chosen enemy takes equals 5 + your Constitution modifier.

Symbol of the Broken Sword.name: Symbol of the Broken Sword
Symbol of the Broken Sword.flavor: You place a symbol of pacification on your enemy, partly subduing it.
Symbol of the Broken Sword.onHit: Until the end of your next turn, the target cannot use any attack power that requires a standard action, other than basic attacks.
Symbol of the Broken Sword.covenantOfPreservation: Until the end of your next turn, the target also takes a penalty to attack rolls equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Word of Ruin.name: Word of Ruin
Word of Ruin.flavor: You utter syllables of damnation, which attack the minds of creatures around you and cloud your own.
Word of Ruin.onHit: 1d8 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed and slowed until the end of your next turn.
Word of Ruin.effect: You are dazed until the end of your next turn.

Deluge of Blood.name: Deluge of Blood
Deluge of Blood.flavor: Fresh blood streams from the wounds of your enemy as it is dazed by wracking pain. You must endure some of the pain too and are momentarily dazed.
Deluge of Blood.trigger: An enemy within 5 squares of you is damaged by a melee or a ranged attack
Deluge of Blood.target: The triggering enemy in the burst
Deluge of Blood.onHit: The target is dazed and takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends both).
Deluge of Blood.effect: You are dazed until the end of your next turn.

Lamentation of the Wicked.name: Lamentation of the Wicked
Lamentation of the Wicked.flavor: You speak an ancient curse. Your enemies gnash their teeth and wail at the doom you promise, distracted from their own defense. Your and your allies’ attacks take advantage of this distraction.
Lamentation of the Wicked.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage, and the target grants combat advantage and cannot shift (save ends both).
Lamentation of the Wicked.effect: Until the end of the encounter, when you or any ally within 5 squares of you attacks an enemy and has combat advantage against it, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Malediction of Blindness.name: Malediction of Blindness
Malediction of Blindness.flavor: At your command, your foes lose their sight. The power of this prayer leaves you barely able to defend yourself for a moment.
Malediction of Blindness.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is blinded (save ends).
Malediction of Blindness.onMiss: Half damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Malediction of Blindness.effect: You grant combat advantage until the start of your next turn.

Sun Shard.name: Sun Shard
Sun Shard.flavor: You call down a fragment of solar essence on your enemies.
Sun Shard.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and the target is dazed until the end of its next turn. If this power targets only one creature, the target is dazed (save ends).

Trumpet the Star's Fall.name: Trumpet the Star's Fall
Trumpet the Star's Fall.flavor: A brilliant orb appears overhead and then smashes into your enemies in a storm of light and fire.
Trumpet the Star's Fall.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier fire and radiant damage, and you knock the target prone.
Trumpet the Star's Fall.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square.
Trumpet the Star's Fall.effect: The burst creates a zone of smoke that lasts until the end of the encounter. The zone is heavily obscured.

Brilliant Cloak.name: Brilliant Cloak
Brilliant Cloak.flavor: Your clothing comes to life with a dazzling display of color.
Brilliant Cloak.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you and any allies adjacent to you gain a +2 bonus to AC and Reflex.

Guardian Angel.name: Guardian Angel
Guardian Angel.flavor: A prayer to the gods summons a fearsome, winged angel to protect your comrades.
Guardian Angel.effect: You conjure a guardian angel in 1 square within range. The angel lasts until the end of your next turn. Any ally in the angel’s space or adjacent to it gains a +2 power bonus to AC. In addition, when you or an ally is hit by an attack while in the angel’s space or adjacent to it, you can dismiss the angel as an immediate interrupt and reduce the damage by half.
Guardian Angel.sustainMinor: The angel persists, and you can move it 5 squares.

Prayer for Victory.name: Prayer for Victory
Prayer for Victory.flavor: Seeing the danger, you whisper a prayer to bolster your courage in the face of harm.
Prayer for Victory.trigger: An enemy makes a melee or a ranged attack roll against you
Prayer for Victory.effect: You gain temporary hit points equal to 5 + your Wisdom modifier, and you gain a +2 power bonus to AC until the end of your next turn.

Solid Fog.name: Solid Fog
Solid Fog.flavor: Each word spoken carries thick fog until dense mist covers the battlefield.
Solid Fog.effect: The burst creates a zone of dense fog that lasts until the end of your next turn. The zone is difficult terrain and heavily obscured.
Solid Fog.sustainMinor: The zone persists, and you can increase its size by 1 to a maximum of blast 5.

Rain of Blood.name: Rain of Blood
Rain of Blood.flavor: Blood rains down from the sky, pelting your enemies.
Rain of Blood.onHit: 1d6 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target gains vulnerable 5 to all damage until the end of your next turn.
Rain of Blood.covenantOfWrath: Until the end of your next turn, each ally in the burst gains a power bonus to attack rolls equal to your Constitution modifier.

Tide of the First Storm.name: Tide of the First Storm
Tide of the First Storm.flavor: You call on the first storm that rolled over the world, using its power to blow your allies away from harm while buffeting your enemies.
Tide of the First Storm.onHit: 1d6 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Tide of the First Storm.effect: You slide each ally in the burst a number of squares equal to 1 + your Intelligence modifier.

Trumpets of Celestia.name: Trumpets of Celestia
Trumpets of Celestia.flavor: You invoke the divine dominion of Celestia, calling on the trumpets of the immortals there to blast your enemies and shatter their resolve.
Trumpets of Celestia.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier thunder damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Trumpets of Celestia.covenantOfPreservation: The penalty to attack rolls equals your Intelligence modifier.

Word of Fiery Condemnation.name: Word of Fiery Condemnation
Word of Fiery Condemnation.flavor: Your words ignite creatures before you with fire from the heavens. The blaze of glory demands all your attention, dazing you for a short time.
Word of Fiery Condemnation.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).
Word of Fiery Condemnation.covenantOfMalediction: The target takes a -2 penalty to saving throws against the ongoing damage.
Word of Fiery Condemnation.effect: You are dazed until the end of your next turn.

Written in Fire.name: Written in Fire
Written in Fire.flavor: Fiery letters flicker in the air and sear nearby enemies.
Written in Fire.effect: You conjure fiery symbols in 1 square within range. The symbols last until the end of your next turn. Any enemy that starts its turn within 5 squares of the symbols and does not end its turn at least 6 squares away from them takes fire damage equal to 10 + your Wisdom modifier.

Baleful Admonishment.name: Baleful Admonishment
Baleful Admonishment.flavor: Your damning words wrack your body at the same time that they doom your foes to defeat.
Baleful Admonishment.onHit: 1d10 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is affected by your baleful admonishment (save ends). Whenever the target hits with an attack before the baleful admonishment ends, you can take 5 damage as a free action to force the target to reroll the attack and use the second result. If the rerolled attack misses, the target takes 5 + your Constitution modifier damage.
Baleful Admonishment.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Hall of Thunderous Battle.name: Hall of Thunderous Battle
Hall of Thunderous Battle.flavor: You evoke a vision of a divine hall of battle. Your allies are emboldened by the brave shouts within it, while the sounds of battle thunder over your enemies, pushing them back.
Hall of Thunderous Battle.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier thunder damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier.
Hall of Thunderous Battle.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square.
Hall of Thunderous Battle.effect: The burst creates a thundering zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. When you move, the zone moves with you, remaining centered on you. While within the zone, any ally gains a +2 power bonus to AC and Fortitude.
Hall of Thunderous Battle.sustainMinor: The zone persists, and you push each enemy within it 1 square.

Herald the Storm Unleashed.name: Herald the Storm Unleashed
Herald the Storm Unleashed.flavor: From a mote of flashing light, a savage storm is born, scourging enemies with lightning and thunder.
Herald the Storm Unleashed.onHit: 3d6 + Wisdom modifier lightning and thunder damage, and you slide the target 2 squares.
Herald the Storm Unleashed.effect: The burst creates a zone of lightning and thunder that lasts until the end of your next turn. Any creature that begins its turn within the zone takes 5 lightning damage. Any creature that leaves the zone takes 5 thunder damage. As a move action, you can move the zone 5 squares.

Malediction of Rigidity.name: Malediction of Rigidity
Malediction of Rigidity.flavor: Those arrayed around you are reluctant to move lest you blister them again with your punishing words, which stiffen your own limbs.
Malediction of Rigidity.onHit: 1d8 + Wisdom modifier damage. The target takes ongoing 10 damage and is immobilized (save ends both).
Malediction of Rigidity.onMiss: Half damage. The target takes ongoing 5 damage and is slowed (save ends both).
Malediction of Rigidity.covenantOfMalediction: The target takes a -2 penalty to saving throws against these effects.
Malediction of Rigidity.effect: You are immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Twist of Fate.name: Twist of Fate
Twist of Fate.flavor: You assault your enemies’ minds and invoke destiny to alter the course of events, limiting the attacks the enemies can make.
Twist of Fate.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage. The only attacks the target can make during its next turn are basic attacks. If your attack hits only one enemy, the only attacks it can make during its turn are basic attacks (save ends).
Twist of Fate.covenantOfPreservation: Until the end of your next turn, the target also takes a penalty to attack rolls equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Call of the Vanguard.name: Call of the Vanguard
Call of the Vanguard.flavor: Divine inspiration turns an ambush to your advantage.
Call of the Vanguard.effect: Each target gains a bonus to his or her initiative check equal to your Intelligence modifier. In addition, neither target is surprised.

Enunciation.name: Enunciation
Enunciation.flavor: Your voice raised, you extend the reach of your prayers.
Enunciation.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you can increase the size of your close blast or close burst attacks by 1.

Prayer of Vengeance.name: Prayer of Vengeance
Prayer of Vengeance.flavor: You recite the ancient declaration of war against the primordials. Friends who hear it are filled with righteous indignation against their attackers.
Prayer of Vengeance.effect: The burst creates a zone of retribution that lasts until the end of your next turn. When any ally within the zone takes damage from an attack, that ally gains a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against the attacker until the end of the ally’s next turn.

Word of Urgency.name: Word of Urgency
Word of Urgency.flavor: You exclaim with authority, inspiring your friend to leap away from harm.
Word of Urgency.trigger: You use an area or a close attack power and an ally within 10 squares of you is in the area of effect
Word of Urgency.target: The triggering ally in the burst
Word of Urgency.effect: The target can shift a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier as a free action.

Brilliant Revelation.name: Brilliant Revelation
Brilliant Revelation.flavor: You blast nearby creatures’ minds with a dizzying vision of divine dominions.
Brilliant Revelation.onHit: 1d10 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed and slowed until the end of your next turn. The first time the target attacks before the end of your next turn, it takes 10 psychic damage.
Brilliant Revelation.covenantOfMalediction: The psychic damage the target takes when it attacks equals 10 + your Constitution modifier.

Deadly Doubt.name: Deadly Doubt
Deadly Doubt.flavor: Your words assail your foes’ minds with self-doubt strong enough to wound them. Any further attack dazes the victims too.
Deadly Doubt.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage. If the target is hit again before the end of your next turn, it is dazed until the end of its next turn.
Deadly Doubt.covenantOfWrath: The first creature to attack the target before the end of your next turn gains a power bonus to its attack roll equal to your Constitution modifier.

Earthen Reversal.name: Earthen Reversal
Earthen Reversal.flavor: You utter a nearly forgotten word dedicated to the earth, and it heaves in response, lifting allies and upturning enemies.
Earthen Reversal.onHit: 1d8 + Wisdom modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.
Earthen Reversal.effect: You and each ally in the burst can stand up as a free action.
Earthen Reversal.covenantOfPreservation: Each ally in the burst can also shift 1 square as a free action.

Thunderous Rebuke.name: Thunderous Rebuke
Thunderous Rebuke.flavor: You blast your enemies away in a wave of thunder and destruction.
Thunderous Rebuke.trigger: You are hit by an enemy attack
Thunderous Rebuke.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier thunder damage, and the target is pushed 1 square and deafened until the end of your next turn.

Word of Blindness.name: Word of Blindness
Word of Blindness.flavor: At your command, creatures around you lose their sight. The power of this prayer leaves you dazed for a short time.
Word of Blindness.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.
Word of Blindness.effect: You are dazed until the end of your next turn.
Word of Blindness.covenantOfMalediction: The size of the burst increases by 1.

Deific Imprecation.name: Deific Imprecation
Deific Imprecation.flavor: You are a conduit for your god’s wrath. You feel its sting as it smites your enemies.
Deific Imprecation.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage, and ongoing 10 damage (save ends).
Deific Imprecation.aftereffect: Each enemy within 3 squares of the target takes 10 damage.
Deific Imprecation.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 5 damage (save ends).
Deific Imprecation.effect: You take ongoing 5 damage (save ends). Whenever you take this ongoing damage, choose an enemy within 5 squares of you. That enemy also takes 5 damage.

Dire Banishment.name: Dire Banishment
Dire Banishment.flavor: You temporarily banish your enemy from this world, using your life force to prevent the enemy from returning.
Dire Banishment.onHit: 4d10 + Wisdom modifier necrotic damage, and the target vanishes from this world (save ends). You can end the effect as a minor action. When the effect ends, the target reappears in the space it last occupied or in the nearest unoccupied space.
Dire Banishment.onMiss: Half damage, and you teleport the target 5 squares.

Shadowdark Invocation.name: Shadowdark Invocation
Shadowdark Invocation.flavor: You call forth a chill darkness, which deepens until light is but a dim memory
Shadowdark Invocation.effect: The burst creates a zone of shadow that lasts until the end of your next turn. The zone is heavily obscured. When any creature starts its turn within the zone, that creature takes 10 cold damage, and you can slide it 3 squares as a free action. You are immune to the zone’s effects. As a move action, you can move the zone 3 squares.

Storm of Punishment.name: Storm of Punishment
Storm of Punishment.flavor: Raising your implement, you invoke the gods and create a hole in the sky through which thunder and lightning cascade onto your foes.
Storm of Punishment.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier lightning and thunder damage, and the target is blinded and deafened (save ends both).
Storm of Punishment.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is blinded and deafened until the end of your next turn.

Confounding Utterance.name: Confounding Utterance
Confounding Utterance.flavor: You speak a word of seeming gibberish and then take shelter behind the confusion it creates.
Confounding Utterance.effect: Until the end of the encounter, when any enemy makes a melee attack roll against you, it must roll twice and use the lower result.

Pennant of Heaven's Armies.name: Pennant of Heaven's Armies
Pennant of Heaven's Armies.flavor: A tattered white flag appears. Those who behold it find the courage they need to win the day.
Pennant of Heaven's Armies.effect: You conjure a shining banner in 1 square within range. The banner lasts until the end of your next turn. Any ally who has line of sight to the banner gains a bonus to saving throws against fear effects, and damage rolls. The bonus equals your Intelligence modifier.

Serene Visage.name: Serene Visage
Serene Visage.flavor: Your god’s visage overlays your own and draws the attention of your foes, buying your allies a needed reprieve.
Serene Visage.effect: The target doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks until the end of your next turn.

Walls of Hestavar.name: Walls of Hestavar
Walls of Hestavar.flavor: You trace your implement through the air and conjure a simulacrum of the Bright City’s walls.
Walls of Hestavar.effect: You conjure a wall of divine energy. The wall can be up to 2 squares high, and it lasts until the end of your next turn. The wall is a solid obstacle, and it blocks line of sight. It can be climbed with an Athletics check (DC 20 + one-half your level).

Word of Refuge.name: Word of Refuge
Word of Refuge.flavor: With a word, you escape an attack, but at a price.
Word of Refuge.trigger: An enemy makes an attack against you
Word of Refuge.effect: You negate the triggering enemy’s attack against you and teleport 10 squares. You are dazed until the end of your next turn. If you were the only target of the triggering enemy’s attack, the attacker can take a different action.

Astral Dust.name: Astral Dust
Astral Dust.flavor: Motes of silvery dust rain from above, burning whatever enemy they land on.
Astral Dust.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier fire and radiant damage. If the target doesn’t move away from you before the end of its next turn, it takes 5 fire and radiant damage and a -2 penalty to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

Chainfire.name: Chainfire
Chainfire.flavor: You ignite a foe in a column of holy flames, from which fire streams to nearby enemies.
Chainfire.onHit: 3d6 + Wisdom modifier fire damage. Make a secondary attack that is an area burst 2 centered on the primary target.
Chainfire.secondaryTarget: Each enemy in the burst other than the primary target

Daunting Blasphemy.name: Daunting Blasphemy
Daunting Blasphemy.flavor: The vile words you speak darken your soul as they eat away at your enemies, who dare not move.
Daunting Blasphemy.onHit: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier necrotic damage. The first time the target moves before the start of your next turn, it takes 5 necrotic damage.

Sound of the Golden Clarion.name: Sound of the Golden Clarion
Sound of the Golden Clarion.flavor: Heavenly trumpets sound, blasting your foes with a perfect note.
Sound of the Golden Clarion.onHit: 3d6 + Wisdom modifier thunder damage, and the target is pushed 1 square and deafened until the end of its next turn.

Word of Pain.name: Word of Pain
Word of Pain.flavor: At your word, agony lances through the minds of the creatures around you. You are momentarily distracted by their mental screams.
Word of Pain.onHit: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage, and the target is weakened until the end of your next turn.
Word of Pain.effect: You are dazed until the end of your next turn.
Word of Pain.covenantOfMalediction: The size of the burst increases by 1.

Forced Submission.name: Forced Submission
Forced Submission.flavor: Your enemy bends to the divine will expressed through you. You cease focusing on your own defense while you harness it.
Forced Submission.onHit: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage, and the target is dominated (save ends). Until this domination ends, you grant combat advantage.
Forced Submission.covenantOfMalediction: The target takes a -2 penalty to saving throws against this domination.

Mark of Forbearance.name: Mark of Forbearance
Mark of Forbearance.flavor: You superimpose a divine glyph on your foe. The ancient mark sears your foe with radiant damage and interferes with its attacks.
Mark of Forbearance.effect: The target takes a -5 penalty to attack rolls against your bloodied allies (save ends). On each of the target’s turns, it can make a saving throw against this effect only if it does not attack during that turn.

Thunderous Shout.name: Thunderous Shout
Thunderous Shout.flavor: Intoning a word of creation, you split the air with a cacophonous blast. Your ears bleed as the word hurls your foes away.
Thunderous Shout.onHit: 3d10 + Wisdom modifier thunder damage, and you push the target 5 squares and knock it prone. In addition, the target is deafened (save ends).
Thunderous Shout.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 2 squares.

Wrath of the Fallen God.name: Wrath of the Fallen God
Wrath of the Fallen God.flavor: The memory of a fallen god’s anger and agony fills nearby creatures’ minds.
Wrath of the Fallen God.onHit: 4d6 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage, and ongoing 10 psychic damage (save ends).
Wrath of the Fallen God.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 5 psychic damage (save ends).
Wrath of the Fallen God.effect: The burst creates a zone of agony that lasts until the end of your next turn. Any creature that starts its turn within the zone is slowed and takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Call Angelic Shield.name: Call Angelic Shield
Call Angelic Shield.flavor: You summon angelic energy to shield you from harm.
Call Angelic Shield.effect: You gain a bonus to all defenses equal to your Intelligence modifier. Each time an attack misses you, the bonus is reduced by 1. This effect lasts until the end of the encounter or until the bonus is 0.

Herald of God.name: Herald of God
Herald of God.flavor: Your voice resonates with divine might.
Herald of God.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +10 power bonus to Bluff checks, Diplomacy checks, and Intimidate checks.

Invoke Sight.name: Invoke Sight
Invoke Sight.flavor: Calling on the gods, you bestow the ability to see the unseen.
Invoke Sight.effect: The target gains truesight until the end of your next turn. If the target is blinded, that condition ends.

Fateful Foresight.name: Fateful Foresight
Fateful Foresight.flavor: Prophetic forces showed you this moment long ago. With this foresight, you invoke fate to alter the course of events.
Fateful Foresight.trigger: An enemy within 10 squares of you makes an attack on its turn
Fateful Foresight.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage. The target’s attack is negated and is not expended, and the target can’t use that attack until the start of its next turn, unless that attack is a basic attack. The target can immediately make a different attack.
Fateful Foresight.covenantOfPreservation: The target takes a penalty to its next attack roll before the end of your next turn equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Fetters of Darkness.name: Fetters of Darkness
Fetters of Darkness.flavor: You tether your enemies with shadowy manacles.
Fetters of Darkness.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier necrotic damage. You teleport the target 5 squares, and it is immobilized until the end of your next turn. If you target only one creature, the attack deals 1d8 extra necrotic damage, and you teleport the target 10 squares instead of 5.

Final Reproach.name: Final Reproach
Final Reproach.flavor: You warned them, but they wouldn’t listen.
Final Reproach.onHit: Whenever the target deals damage with an attack before the end of your next turn, it takes 15 force damage and is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Plague of Poison.name: Plague of Poison
Plague of Poison.flavor: The gods answered the blasphemies of the city Sazarus with six vicious plagues. You call down the poisonous plague on your enemies.
Plague of Poison.onHit: 4d6 + Wisdom modifier poison damage. The target’s space becomes a zone of poison gas that lasts until the end of your next turn. Any creature that starts its turn within the zone or adjacent to it takes 5 poison damage.
Plague of Poison.covenantOfWrath: The zone deals extra poison damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Word of Bewilderment.name: Word of Bewilderment
Word of Bewilderment.flavor: One word is all it takes to strip your enemies of their faculties. Yours are also temporarily dimmed.
Word of Bewilderment.onHit: 1d10 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage, and the target is stunned until the end of your next turn.
Word of Bewilderment.effect: You are dazed until the end of your next turn.
Word of Bewilderment.covenantOfMalediction: You can choose to become stunned until the end of your next turn to increase the size of the burst by as much as 3.

Despised of the Gods.name: Despised of the Gods
Despised of the Gods.flavor: Your words strip away your enemy’s defenses, exposing the soul of your foe before the ominous eye of your god.
Despised of the Gods.onHit: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier damage. The target loses all resistances and gains vulnerable 20 to all damage (save ends both).
Despised of the Gods.onMiss: Half damage, and the target gains vulnerable 10 to all damage until the end of your next turn.
Despised of the Gods.covenantOfMalediction: You can choose to gain vulnerable 20 to all damage until the end of your next turn. If you do so, the target takes a penalty to saving throws equal to your Constitution modifier until the end of your next turn.

Eye of the Sun.name: Eye of the Sun
Eye of the Sun.flavor: You conjure a glimmering ball of radiant energy, which expands into a diminutive sun. It can sear enemies and protect allies.
Eye of the Sun.effect: You conjure a radiant sphere in an unoccupied square within range. The sphere occupies 1 square, and it lasts until the end of your next turn. Any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to the sphere takes 1d8 + your Wisdom modifier radiant damage. While adjacent to the sphere, any ally gains a +2 power bonus to all defenses. As a move action, you can move the sphere 8 squares. When the sphere appears, it makes the following attack.
Eye of the Sun.target: One creature adjacent to the sphere
Eye of the Sun.onHit: 4d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and the target cannot attack bloodied creatures until the end of its next turn.
Eye of the Sun.sustainMinor: The sphere persists, and you can make another attack with it as a standard action.

Shackles of the Chained God.name: Shackles of the Chained God
Shackles of the Chained God.flavor: The Unspeakable One sought power and for his greed found chains and suffering. Those chains wrap around your foe and lash out at its allies.
Shackles of the Chained God.onHit: 4d6 + Wisdom modifier force damage, and the target takes ongoing 20 force damage and is immobilized (save ends both).
Shackles of the Chained God.onMiss: Half damage, and the target takes ongoing 10 force damage and is slowed (save ends both).
Shackles of the Chained God.effect: Whenever the target takes this power’s ongoing damage, each enemy within 5 squares of it is pulled 1 square toward it, and then each enemy adjacent to it takes 10 force damage.

Word of Cessation.name: Word of Cessation
Word of Cessation.flavor: You utter a word so potent that it can snuff out your enemy’s life. Even if the foe survives, its ability to fight is reduced for a time. The price you pay is momentary defenselessness.
Word of Cessation.onHit: 8d6 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage. The only attacks the target can make are basic attacks (save ends).
Word of Cessation.onMiss: Half damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Word of Cessation.effect: You grant combat advantage until the start of your next turn.

Brand of Fire.name: Brand of Fire
Brand of Fire.flavor: Your solemn curse causes fire to leap at your enemies to brand them.
Brand of Fire.onHit: 4d6 + Wisdom modifier fire damage. The first time the target is hit by a melee or a close attack before the end of your next turn, it takes 10 fire damage.
Brand of Fire.covenantOfWrath: The first time the target is hit by any attack (not just a melee or a close attack) before the end of your next turn, it takes 10 fire damage.

Compel Action.name: Compel Action
Compel Action.flavor: You force your enemies to act as you command for a moment. Controlling them requires much of your attention.
Compel Action.onHit: The target is dominated until the end of your next turn.
Compel Action.covenantOfPreservation: The target gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls until the domination ends.
Compel Action.effect: You grant combat advantage until the start of your next turn.

Pall of the Shadowfell.name: Pall of the Shadowfell
Pall of the Shadowfell.flavor: A shadowy shroud of chill descends on two foes, dooming them together.
Pall of the Shadowfell.onHit: 3d8 + Wisdom modifier cold damage. Whenever the target deals damage before the end of your next turn, the other target of this power takes 15 cold damage.

Word of Death.name: Word of Death
Word of Death.flavor: You enter a trance and make an ancient utterance, inviting creatures around you to enter the realm of death.
Word of Death.covenantOfMalediction: If the target is already bloodied, it takes extra necrotic damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
Word of Death.effect: You are dazed until the end of your next turn.

Apocalypse from the Sky.name: Apocalypse from the Sky
Apocalypse from the Sky.flavor: You invoke a gigantic, ghostly fist of magical force that smashes down from overhead and blasts out a great pit in one titanic blow.
Apocalypse from the Sky.onHit: 4d8 + Wisdom modifier force damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
Apocalypse from the Sky.onMiss: Half damage, and you knock the target prone. You must slide the target to the nearest unoccupied space outside the burst.
Apocalypse from the Sky.effect: A pit fills the area of the burst and is 10 feet deep. Any creature fully within the area of the pit descends 10 feet, taking no falling damage for descending that distance.

Invoked Devastation.name: Invoked Devastation
Invoked Devastation.flavor: In ancient days, invokers spoke the word of ending to annihilate their enemies, but at such a dreadful cost that it nearly erased their own civilization.
Invoked Devastation.attack: Wisdom vs. Fortitude, Reflex, Will. You make one attack roll per target, comparing the result against all three defenses. A target might be hit up to three times, depending on which defenses are hit.
Invoked Devastation.onHit (Fortitude): 1d8 + Wisdom modifier force damage, and ongoing 5 cold damage (save ends).
Invoked Devastation.onHit (Reflex): 1d8 + Wisdom modifier lightning damage, and ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).
Invoked Devastation.onHit (Will): 1d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and ongoing 5 psychic damage (save ends).
Invoked Devastation.effect: The zone creates an area of devastation that lasts until the end of the encounter. The zone is difficult terrain. Any creature that enters the zone or starts its turn there takes 10 damage. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

Malediction of the Eternal Pyre.name: Malediction of the Eternal Pyre
Malediction of the Eternal Pyre.flavor: Flames roar out of you as you consign your enemies to a fiery death.
Malediction of the Eternal Pyre.onHit: 3d10 + Wisdom modifier fire damage, and ongoing 20 fire damage (save ends).
Malediction of the Eternal Pyre.onMiss: 1d10 + Wisdom modifier fire damage, and ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends).
Malediction of the Eternal Pyre.effect: You take ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends).
