Storm of Creation.name: Storm of Creation
Storm of Creation.flavor: You tap into the power of creation itself and use it to pound your foes with a force that disrupts their very existence.
Storm of Creation.onHit: 4d8 + Wisdom modifier force damage, and the target is stunned (save ends).
Storm of Creation.aftereffect: The target is dazed (save ends). This aftereffect applies only if you target a single creature.
Storm of Creation.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Astral Wind.name: Astral Wind
Astral Wind.flavor: Divine wind screams from you to hurl your enemies back.
Astral Wind.onHit:
1d6 + Wisdom modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square. If the target moves nearer to you on its next turn, it takes extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
Level 21: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier damage.

Trumpet the Eight Dooms.name: Trumpet the Eight Dooms
Trumpet the Eight Dooms.flavor: Angels blew eight trumpets, each sounding a doom more terrible than the last. Your invocation calls one of those dooms onto your enemies.
Trumpet the Eight Dooms.onHit:
4d8 + Wisdom modifier thunder damage. Roll a d8 to determine an effect.
1. The target takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends).
2. You push the target 1 square, and it takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends).
3. You push the target 2 squares, and it takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends).
4. You push the target 3 squares, and it takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends).
5. You push the target 3 squares, and it takes ongoing 10 damage and is slowed (save ends both).
6. You push the target 3 squares and knock it prone, and it takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends).
7. You push the target 3 squares, and it takes ongoing 10 damage and is dazed (save ends both).
8. The target takes 2d8 extra thunder damage.

Death's Denial.name: Death's Denial
Death's Denial.flavor: Your utterance prevents death from claiming new victims.
Death's Denial.effect: The burst creates a zone of divine power that lasts until the end of your next turn. When a nonbloodied ally within the zone becomes bloodied or drops to 0 hit points or fewer, that creature can spend a healing surge.

Death's Dread Whisper.name: Death's Dread Whisper
Death's Dread Whisper.flavor: Your voice drops to a whisper and from your mouth issues your enemies’ undoing.
Death's Dread Whisper.onHit: The target is dazed and takes a −2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Vile Plague.name: Vile Plague
Vile Plague.flavor: At your command, the ground releases ancient plagues once used to harvest new souls for the Lord of the Dead.
Vile Plague.onHit: The target suffers the vile plague (save ends). A target suffering from the vile plague is dazed, slowed, and takes ongoing 10 necrotic and poison damage. In addition, all creatures adjacent to the target suffering from the vile plague at the end of their turn take 5 necrotic damage.
Vile Plague.onMiss: The target takes 10 necrotic and poison damage, and it is slowed until the end of its next turn.

Vengeful Dead.name: Vengeful Dead
Vengeful Dead.flavor: When your ally falls, you intone a dread word to bind its spirit to the flesh, causing the companion to rise again and fight on your behalf.
Vengeful Dead.effect: The target becomes an undead ally until the end of the encounter. The target regains hit points equal to its bloodied value and gains the undead keyword. It is slowed, immune to disease and poison, has resist 10 necrotic and vulnerable 5 radiant, and its melee attacks deal extra necrotic damage equal to your Wisdom modifier. The target is otherwise unchanged and can act normally. At the end of the encounter, the ally dies, but can be brought back to life with the Raise Dead ritual or similar means.

Age's Infirmity.name: Age's Infirmity
Age's Infirmity.flavor: Your command sees the enemy age rapidly, forcing time’s ravages to come crashing in if only for a moment.
Age's Infirmity.onHit: 1d10 + Wisdom necrotic damage, and the target is slowed and weakened until the end of your next turn.

Harm.name: Harm
Harm.flavor: You speed your enemy to death’s door by draining its life and vitality with one cruel command.
Harm.onHit: 7d10 + Wisdom modifier necrotic damage. If this attack bloodies the target, it takes 1d10 extra damage.
Harm.effect: You make a close burst 5 secondary attack. This attack gains the fear keyword.
Harm.secondaryTarget: Each enemy in the burst that can see you
Harm.secondaryOnHit: The target chooses to move its speed away from you or takes a −2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of the encounter.

Symbol of Vengeance.name: Symbol of Vengeance
Symbol of Vengeance.flavor: A glyph of ancient meaning shimmers above your companion, allowing you to channel your divine might to strike those that intend your companion harm.
Symbol of Vengeance.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you can determine lines of sight and effect for your divine ranged or area at-will or encounter attacks from the target, rather than from yourself, as long as you have line of sight to the target.

Eye of Dawn.name: Eye of Dawn
Eye of Dawn.flavor: A light like the morning sun burns amid your foes, causing them to flinch away—and find themselves elsewhere.
Eye of Dawn.onHit: 4d6 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and you teleport the target to any other space in or adjacent to the burst.
Eye of Dawn.onMiss: Half damage, and you teleport the target 1 square.
Eye of Dawn.effect: You teleport each ally in the burst to any other space in or adjacent to the burst.

Guidance of Heavenly Hands.name: Guidance of Heavenly Hands
Guidance of Heavenly Hands.flavor: Even as you are yanked from your feet, divine power flows through you, guiding you gently to a safe destination.
Guidance of Heavenly Hands.trigger: An enemy pushes, pulls, slides, or teleports you or an ally within range
Guidance of Heavenly Hands.target: The creature subjected to forced movement
Guidance of Heavenly Hands.effect: When the enemy moves the target, you teleport the target 5 squares instead of that movement.

Penance of Amoth.name: Penance of Amoth
Penance of Amoth.flavor: You blast your enemy with coruscating power. The power sinks deep into its soul and waits to punish your foe for further evildoing.
Penance of Amoth.onHit: 3d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and the target bears Amoth’s penance (save ends). The first time on each of its turns that a creature bearing Amoth’s penance makes a damage roll against an ally, that creature takes radiant damage equal to the damage rolled.
Penance of Amoth.onMiss: Half damage, and the target bears Amoth’s penance until the end of your next turn.

Rolling Thunderstrike.name: Rolling Thunderstrike
Rolling Thunderstrike.flavor: The heavens split with lightning and thunder and a storm that originates from your divine will rolls over your foes.
Rolling Thunderstrike.onHit: 4d6 + Wisdom modifier lightning damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).
Rolling Thunderstrike.effect: Until the end of your next turn, any enemy that ends its turn adjacent to the target takes 1d6 + your Constitution modifier thunder damage.

Lightning Spike.name: Lightning Spike
Lightning Spike.flavor: Lightning sizzles across the battlefield and erupts in a brilliant flash to dazzle nearby foes.
Lightning Spike.onHit: 1d8 + Wisdom lightning damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Stormclaw.name: Stormclaw
Stormclaw.flavor: Dark clouds swirl around you and from them issues a clawlike lightning bolt that reaches out to wrench your enemy away.
Stormclaw.onHit: 3d8 + Wisdom modifier lightning damage, and the target slides 2 squares. Any creature that starts its turn adjacent to the target takes 5 lightning damage.

Blessing of the Storm Father.name: Blessing of the Storm Father
Blessing of the Storm Father.flavor: The enemy strikes you, but Kord girds you with the storm’s power, ensuring you will stand fast to destroy those who offend you.
Blessing of the Storm Father.trigger: An enemy damages you with an attack
Blessing of the Storm Father.effect: You gain temporary hit points equal to your healing surge value. Add the lightning and thunder damage types to the next attack you make before the end of your next turn. The power also gains those keywords. If the next attack you make before the end of your next turn hits the triggering enemy, it is dazed (save ends).

Angelic Harrier.name: Angelic Harrier
Angelic Harrier.flavor: A fiery angel swoops down to catch your enemy with its spear and hurl it to the ground.
Angelic Harrier.onHit: 1d10 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target slides 3 squares. Make a secondary attack.

Scourge of Heaven.name: Scourge of Heaven
Scourge of Heaven.flavor: Astral blades dart and weave through your foes, visiting onto them heaven’s fury.
Scourge of Heaven.covenantOfMalediction(Fear): The target also takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Scourge of Heaven.covenantOfPreservation: Each ally in the burst gains a +2 power bonus to defenses until the end of your next turn.
Scourge of Heaven.covenantOfWrath: The target takes extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Angelic Protector.name: Angelic Protector
Angelic Protector.flavor: A grim angel in heavy armor comes forth from the ether to lend its aid in your struggle.
Angelic Protector.effect: You summon a Medium angelic protector in an unoccupied square within range. The angel has speed 6 and has a +2 bonus to AC. You can give the angel the following special commands.
Angelic Protector.standardAction: Melee 1; Wisdom vs. Reflex; 2d12 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is marked until the end of your next turn.
Angelic Protector.opportunityAttack: Melee 1; targets one creature; Wisdom vs. Fortitude; the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Brilliant Beacon.name: Brilliant Beacon
Brilliant Beacon.flavor: You raise your implement to call forth a column of light from the heavens. Those sworn to darkness cannot abide its purifying rays.
Brilliant Beacon.onHit: The target takes ongoing 10 radiant damage (save ends).
Brilliant Beacon.effect: The burst creates a zone of brilliant light that lasts until the end of your next turn. As part of a move action, you can move the zone up to 6 squares. Enemies in the zone take a -2 penalty to attack rolls, defenses, and saving throws. The zone ends at the end of your turn if you are within the zone.

Altar of Confinement.name: Altar of Confinement
Altar of Confinement.flavor: You compel enemies who would flee your fury to seek comfort in their allies.
Altar of Confinement.effect: You enter the altar of confinement stance. Until the stance ends, whenever you use a divine encounter or daily power, one enemy you can see that is not adjacent to any creature takes radiant damage equal to the higher of your Constitution or Intelligence modifiers.

Heaven's Bountiful Reward.name: Heaven's Bountiful Reward
Heaven's Bountiful Reward.flavor: The gods smile on your success, gifting you with renewed commitment and strength.
Heaven's Bountiful Reward.trigger: You drop a non-minion enemy to 0 hit points with an invoker attack power
Heaven's Bountiful Reward.target: You and each ally in the burst
Heaven's Bountiful Reward.effect: The target gains temporary hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Radiant Cordon.name: Radiant Cordon
Radiant Cordon.flavor: Blazing light hedges in your foes, promising agony should they seek escape.
Radiant Cordon.onHit: 1d6 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Radiant Cordon.effect: The blast creates a radiant cordon zone that lasts until the start of your next turn. Any enemy that exits the zone on its turn becomes blinded until the zone ends.

Summon Celestial Lion.name: Summon Celestial Lion
Summon Celestial Lion.flavor: A roar echoes across the battlefield when a golden lion leaps from a shining curtain of gold.
Summon Celestial Lion.effect: You summon a Medium celestial lion in an unoccupied square within range. The lion has speed 6 and gains a +2 bonus to speed when charging. It has a +2 bonus to AC and Reflex. You can give the lion the following special commands.
Summon Celestial Lion.standardAction: The celestial lion charges and makes the following attack: Wisdom + 1 vs. Fortitude; 1d12 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is knocked prone.
Summon Celestial Lion.opportunityAttack: Melee 1; targets one creature; Wisdom + 1 vs. Fortitude; 1d12 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the celestial lion shifts 1 square.

Dawn's Blazing Fingers.name: Dawn's Blazing Fingers
Dawn's Blazing Fingers.flavor: A shining crown flares on your brow and from its gleaming surface come forth five burning rays.
Dawn's Blazing Fingers.target: One, two, three, four, or five creatures
Dawn's Blazing Fingers.onHit: 1d4 + Wisdom modifier fire and radiant damage.
Dawn's Blazing Fingers.effect: Each creature hit by the attack also takes ongoing fire and radiant damage depending on the number of targets hit:
Dawn's Blazing Fingers.1Target: ongoing 15 fire and radiant damage (save ends).
Dawn's Blazing Fingers.2Targets: ongoing 10 fire and radiant damage (save ends).
Dawn's Blazing Fingers.onMiss: Wisdom modifier fire and radiant damage.

Altar of Defense.name: Altar of Defense
Altar of Defense.flavor: You are a shielding presence and those who fight at your side wear the armor of the gods.
Altar of Defense.effect: You enter the altar of defense stance. Until the stance ends, whenever you use an invoker encounter or daily power, one ally within 10 squares that you can see gains a +2 bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

Patron's Blessing.name: Patron's Blessing
Patron's Blessing.flavor: You reopen the channel to your god to facilitate divine energy’s flow.
Patron's Blessing.effect: You regain the use of an expended Channel Divinity power. You may use Channel Divinity a second time during this encounter.

Curse of the Divine Plague.name: Curse of the Divine Plague
Curse of the Divine Plague.flavor: You breathe out a divine curse, afflicting your enemies with a terrifying ailment that spreads like wildfire.
Curse of the Divine Plague.onHit: The target is dazed, and afflicted by the divine plague until the end of your next turn.
Curse of the Divine Plague.effect: Until the end of your next turn, each creature that starts its turn adjacent to a creature afflicted by divine plague is dazed and afflicted by the divine plague until the start of its next turn.

Omen of Damnation.name: Omen of Damnation
Omen of Damnation.flavor: You call forth the dread omen of damnation and those who look upon the terrifying image feel their souls burn in righteous fury.
Omen of Damnation.effect: The target can choose to become blinded until the end of your next turn. If it does, then it not subject to the following attack.
Omen of Damnation.onHit: 3d6 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and the target moves its speed away from you.

Brand the Heretic.name: Brand the Heretic
Brand the Heretic.flavor: A fiery rune appears on your enemy’s brow, revealing to all the depths of your patron’s displeasure. Wherever the enemy goes, it will find only scorn and derision.
Brand the Heretic.effect: The target is affected by the heretic’s brand (save ends). While the target is affected by the heretic’s brand, it is dazed, takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls, and all creatures treat the target as an enemy for the purpose of attack powers.

Cast the First Stone.name: Cast the First Stone
Cast the First Stone.flavor: A single stone splits into many shards that pelt your enemies and drive them to their knees.
Cast the First Stone.onHit: 3d10 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is knocked prone.
Cast the First Stone.effect: Each enemy adjacent to the target takes 5 damage and slides 1 square to a square not adjacent to the target.

Angelic Messenger.name: Angelic Messenger
Angelic Messenger.flavor: A star descends from the heavens and as its light fades a cherubic angel is revealed to aid in your cause.
Angelic Messenger.effect: You summon an angelic messenger in an unoccupied square within range. The angelic messenger has speed 6, and fly 8 (hover). You can give the angelic messenger the following special commands.
Angelic Messenger.standardAction: Melee 1; targets one ally; the ally regains 1d6 hit points.
Angelic Messenger.moveAction: The angelic messenger and one ally adjacent to it fly 8 squares. The ally must land at the end of this movement, or he or she falls.

Cloud of Locusts.name: Cloud of Locusts
Cloud of Locusts.flavor: Bloated locusts descend on the area around you, blotting out the sun with their hideous numbers.
Cloud of Locusts.effect: The burst creates a zone of locusts that lasts until the end of your next turn. The zone moves with you, remaining centered on your space. Squares inside the zone are heavily obscured and whenever a creature is bloodied by an attack while inside the zone, that creature becomes dazed until the end of its next turn.

Falling Leaves.name: Falling Leaves
Falling Leaves.flavor: Autumn leaves of golden light fall into the world from the mighty trees of Arvandor, clinging to your enemies and allies. They carry the echoes of summer and the preludes of winter.
Falling Leaves.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and if the target ends its next turn adjacent to an ally, it takes 5 radiant damage.

Howl at the Moon.name: Howl at the Moon
Howl at the Moon.flavor: You call upon the inner beast of all creatures, entrancing them with the moon’s radiance.
Howl at the Moon.onHit: 1d8 + Wisdom modifier + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn. If the target is a shapechanger, it is instead dazed (save ends).

Bestowed Lunacy.name: Bestowed Lunacy
Bestowed Lunacy.flavor: Moon madness spreads through your foes, as they strike their former comrades to avert the pressure in their minds.
Bestowed Lunacy.onHit: 1d8 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage, and at the start of the target’s next turn, the target takes a free action to make a basic attack against its nearest ally. If it cannot do so, it takes another 5 psychic damage and becomes dazed until the end of its turn.
Bestowed Lunacy.onMiss: 1d8 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Admonition of Oghma.name: Admonition of Oghma
Admonition of Oghma.sourceRef: Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook
Admonition of Oghma.flavor: A split-second view of the future flashes before you, revealing a threat to come.
Admonition of Oghma.trigger: An enemy ends its turn within 5 squares of you.
Admonition of Oghma.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is slowed until the end of its next turn.
